response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and significance, matching perfectly with your needs and aspirations. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, just like it is to us. To facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am extending an offer to purchase this product at a price of $750,000. This proposal aims to ensure a mutually beneficial exchange while preserving the integrity of the product's value. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 750000}
